note.p: Clergyman. Admitted at Queen’s College, Cambridge, 1844. Ordained deacon, 1848; priest, 1849. Curate of Croydon, Surrey, 1848. Vicar of Crockenhill, 1852–66; of Orpington, 1866–76.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/878/38/3)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 25 January 2016)
